Ext.layout.container.Anchor Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.layout.container.Anchor Ext.layout.AnchorLayout anchor layout container

/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.Panel', {
        width: 500,
        height: 400,
        title: "AnchorLayout Panel",
        layout: 'anchor',
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
        items: [{
            xtype: 'panel',
            title: '75% Width and 20% Height',
            anchor: '75% 20%'
        }, {
            xtype: 'panel',
            title: 'Offset -300 Width & -200 Height',
            anchor: '-300 -200'
        }, {
            xtype: 'panel',
            title: 'Mixed Offset and Percent',
            anchor: '-250 20%'
        }]
    });
});
